file.name: schema_api.blinkist.com.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Blinkist API (api.blinkist.com)
  description: |
    Some of the Blinkist API endpoints used in their Android app.
    This documentation was generated with [mitmproxy2swagger](https://github.com/alufers/mitmproxy2swagger).
    Highly incomplete.
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
- url: https://api.blinkist.com
  description: The default server
paths:
  /content/curated_lists/{uuid}:
    get:
      summary: GET curated_lists by uuid
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  curated_list:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                      position:
                        type: number
                      uuid:
                        type: string
                      slug:
                        type: string
                      title:
                        type: string
                      description:
                        type: string
                      short_description:
                        type: string
                      curator_name:
                        type: string
                      curator_id:
                        type: string
                      etag:
                        type: number
                      language:
                        type: string
                      discoverable:
                        type: boolean
                      published_at:
                        type: string
                      deleted_at:
                        type: object
                      kind:
                        type: string
                      styling:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          main_color:
                            type: object
                          accent_color:
                            type: object
                          text_color:
                            type: object
                          text_on_accent_color:
                            type: object
                      content_items:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                            position:
                              type: number
                            content_item_type:
                              type: string
                            content_item_id:
                              type: string
                            description:
                              type: string
      parameters:
      - name: uuid
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
  /content/metadata:
    get:
      summary: GET metadata
      responses: {}
  /contentinteraction/personalities:
    get:
      summary: GET personalities
      responses: {}
  /content/shows:
    get:
      summary: GET shows
      responses: {}
  /content/shows/{id}:
    get:
      summary: GET shows by id
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                      etag:
                        type: number
                      slug:
                        type: string
                      title:
                        type: string
                      tagline:
                        type: string
                      about:
                        type: string
                      published_at:
                        type: string
                      published:
                        type: boolean
                      publishers:
                        type: string
                      kind:
                        type: string
                      language:
                        type: string
                      styling:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          main_color:
                            type: string
                          accent_color:
                            type: string
                          text_color:
                            type: string
                          text_on_accent_color:
                            type: string
                      images:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          types:
                            type: array
                            items:
                              type: string
                          sizes:
                            type: array
                            items:
                              type: number
                          url_template:
                            type: string
                      episodes:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                            etag:
                              type: number
                            title:
                              type: string
                            description:
                              type: string
                            who_should_listen:
                              type: string
                            teaser:
                              type: string
                            published_at:
                              type: string
                            audio:
                              type: object
                              properties:
                                duration:
                                  type: number
                            images:
                              type: object
                              properties:
                                types:
                                  type: array
                                  items:
                                    type: string
                                sizes:
                                  type: array
                                  items:
                                    type: number
                                url_template:
                                  type: string
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
  /search:
    get:
      summary: GET search
      responses: {}
  /search/suggestions:
    get:
      summary: GET suggestions
      responses: {}
  /content/shortcasts:
    get:
      summary: GET shortcasts
      responses: {}
  /contentinteraction/user_collections:
    get:
      summary: GET user_collections
      responses: {}
  /v4/books:
    get:
      summary: GET books
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  books:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: string
                        etag:
                          type: number
                        deleted_at:
                          type: object
                        published_at:
                          type: string
                        discoverable:
                          type: boolean
                        title:
                          type: string
                        ibooks_id:
                          type: object
                        is_audio:
                          type: boolean
                        subtitle:
                          type: string
                        author:
                          type: string
                        language:
                          type: string
                        about_the_book:
                          type: string
                        teaser:
                          type: string
                        bundle:
                          type: object
                        bundle_id:
                          type: object
                        slug:
                          type: string
                        who_should_read:
                          type: string
                        about_the_author:
                          type: string
                        market:
                          type: string
                        main_color:
                          type: string
                        text_color:
                          type: string
                        image_url:
                          type: string
                        images:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            types:
                              type: array
                              items:
                                type: string
                            sizes:
                              type: array
                              items:
                                type: number
                            url_template:
                              type: string
                        reading_duration:
                          type: number
                        number_of_chapters:
                          type: number
                        further_reading_book_ids:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
  /v4/books/{id}:
    get:
      summary: GET books by id
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  book:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                      etag:
                        type: number
                      deleted_at:
                        type: object
                      published_at:
                        type: string
                      discoverable:
                        type: boolean
                      title:
                        type: string
                      ibooks_id:
                        type: object
                      is_audio:
                        type: boolean
                      subtitle:
                        type: string
                      author:
                        type: string
                      language:
                        type: string
                      about_the_book:
                        type: string
                      teaser:
                        type: string
                      bundle:
                        type: object
                      bundle_id:
                        type: object
                      slug:
                        type: string
                      who_should_read:
                        type: string
                      about_the_author:
                        type: string
                      market:
                        type: string
                      main_color:
                        type: string
                      text_color:
                        type: string
                      image_url:
                        type: string
                      images:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          types:
                            type: array
                            items:
                              type: string
                          sizes:
                            type: array
                            items:
                              type: number
                          url_template:
                            type: string
                      chapters:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                            order_no:
                              type: number
                            title:
                              type: string
                            order_nr:
                              type: number
                      reading_duration:
                        type: number
                      number_of_chapters:
                        type: number
                      further_reading_book_ids:
                        type: array
                        items: {}
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
  /v4/books/{id}/meta:
    get:
      summary: GET meta by id
      responses: {}
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
  /v4/books/{id}/teaser:
    get:
      summary: GET teaser by id
      responses: {}
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
  /v4/books/{id}/territory:
    get:
      summary: GET territory by id
      responses: {}
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
  /v4/books/{id}/similar_books:
    get:
      summary: GET similar_books by id
      responses: {}
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
  /v4/books/{id}/audiobook:
    get:
      summary: GET audiobook by id
      responses: {}
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
  /v4/audiobooks/search_suggestions:
    get:
      summary: GET search_suggestions
      responses: {}
      parameters:
      - name: locale
        in: query
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
  /v4/categories:
    get:
      summary: GET categories
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  categories:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: string
                        etag:
                          type: number
                        priority:
                          type: number
                        restricted_to_languages:
                          type: array
                          items: {}
                        book_ids:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                        i18ns:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              id:
                                type: string
                              language:
                                type: string
                              title:
                                type: string
                              subtitle:
                                type: string
                              slug:
                                type: string
                        image_url:
                          type: string
                        images:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            types:
                              type: array
                              items:
                                type: string
                            sizes:
                              type: array
                              items:
                                type: number
                            url_template:
                              type: string
  /v4/free_books:
    get:
      summary: GET free_books
      responses: {}
  /v4/subscriptions:
    get:
      summary: GET subscriptions
      responses: {}
  /v4/topics:
    get:
      summary: GET topics
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  topics:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: string
                        etag:
                          type: number
                        category_ids:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                        book_ids:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                        i18ns:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              id:
                                type: string
                              language:
                                type: string
                              title:
                                type: string
                              slug:
                                type: string
                              description:
                                type: string
                        image_url:
                          type: string
                        images:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            types:
                              type: array
                              items:
                                type: string
                            sizes:
                              type: array
                              items:
                                type: number
                            url_template:
                              type: string
  /v4/contentaccess/blocked_items:
    get:
      summary: GET blocked_items
      responses: {}
  /contentaccess/free_items:
    get:
      summary: GET free_items
      responses: {}

Error: parse: parse spec: parse path items: path "/content/metadata": get: at 1:1524: responses: no responses
